co2-calculation:
Assumption: similar to dried wheat grains global value from reference 1. 
Assumption: yield similar to wheat grains.
references:
1. Tabelle ZHAW: Kreuzer_2014_Treibhauspotenziale_Nahrungsmittel_eaternity_v2.0_EH; direkte Quelle: Ecoinvent v3.0 Wheat grain {GLO}| market for | Alloc Def, U. 
2. Wikipedia general info on quinoa: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quinoa
calculation-process-documentation:
The seed yield (often around 3 t/ha up to 5 t/ha) is comparable to wheat yields in the Andean areas, after harvest seeds need to be dried (2).

Additional info: mechanization difficult as panicles on the same plant mature at different times. Timing is important. In the US varieties have been selected for uniformity of maturity and are mechanically harvested. The plants are allowed to stand until they are dry (needs clarification) and a moisture content of 10%. The husk is removed.
name: Quinoa
